name: Babushka!
description:
CURRENTLY IN DEVELOPMENT (Babushka functionality coming to a grocery store near you!)

Be egg, achieve greatness!

Traverse this simple platformer as Egg! Jump, dive, and slide your way through levels to find all the trophies and hidden secrets!

Instructions

Use WASD to move, W to jump / dive, A or D once on the floor to slide.

Credits

Music - Stage 3 by sawsquarenoise https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise/dojokratos/stage-3 

License - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ 

Sound effects generated with ChipTone https://sfbgames.com/chiptone/ 

License - https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/

Additional sound effect from ZapSplat https://www.zapsplat.com/ 

License -  https://www.zapsplat.com/license

Using the Godot Engine and Photoshop

Programmed and arted by me ~

Changelog

0.1.0 - Egg art, player controller, temp bg and fun fall after jump mechanic!

0.1.1 - Egg sliding when on ground implemented plus some instructions!

0.2.0 - Tiles, Aesthetic, and Player physics dialed in! Added simple level!

0.2.1 - Added Egg-levator!!! And trophy pickups!

0.2.2 - New Level! Also added secret star pickup, dope sfx, music, and animations!!!

0.2.3 - Trophy and Secret Star stat tracking! Also coyote jump and quirky comments implemented!!!

0.2.4 - Bumpin title screen!!! Splash screens and full screen scaling!

0.3.0 - Added bamboozle!!! Ability to skip splash and bamboozle, new level portal, access to both level 1 and 2, and end card!
